feed.title: Track Awesome Capacitorjs Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: ⚡️ A curated list of awesome things related to Capacitor.

entry.title: Awesome Capacitorjs Updates on Jul 09, 2025
entry.content:
Plugins / Official Plugins

  • @capacitor/file-viewer - The FileViewer API provides mechanisms for opening files and previewing media.
  • @capacitor/file-transfer - The FileTransfer API provides mechanisms for downloading and uploading files.

entry.title: Awesome Capacitorjs Updates on Jun 11, 2025
entry.content:
Plugins / Community Plugins

  • capacitor-app-attest (⭐1) - Apple Attest with Ionic Capacitor
  • capacitor-live-activities (⭐2) - Capacitor plugin to use Live Activities on iOS 16.2+.
  • capacitor-lottie-splash-screen (⭐4) - Capacitor plugin to use Lottie animations as splash screen.
  • capacitor-screenshot (⭐18) - Capacitor plugin to take screenshots.

entry.title: Awesome Capacitorjs Updates on Jul 28, 2024
entry.content:
Plugins / Community Plugins

  • @ebarooni/capacitor-calendar (⭐53) - Capacitor plugin for interacting with calendar and reminders.

entry.title: Awesome Capacitorjs Updates on Apr 08, 2024
entry.content:
Plugins / Community Plugins

  • @aparajita/capacitor-biometric-auth (⭐191) - Easy access to native biometric auth APIs on iOS and Android.
  • @aparajita/capacitor-dark-mode (⭐26) – Universal, reliable dark mode support for Capacitor apps on the web, iOS and Android.
  • @aparajita/capacitor-ios-silent-notifications (⭐4) – Silent (AKA remote) notification support for Capacitor apps on iOS.
  • @aparajita/capacitor-logger (⭐18) – Better logging for the web and native Ionic/Capacitor apps.
  • @aparajita/capacitor-secure-storage (⭐132) - Secure, flexible storage for Capacitor apps using iOS Keychain and Android Keystore.

entry.title: Awesome Capacitorjs Updates on Jan 23, 2024
entry.content:
Plugins / Community Plugins

  • @capawesome-team/capacitor-android-dark-mode-support - Capacitor plugin to support dark mode on Android.
  • @capawesome-team/capacitor-android-foreground-service - Capacitor plugin to run a foreground service on Android.
  • @capawesome-team/capacitor-datetime-picker - Capacitor plugin that let the user easily enter both a date and a time.
  • @capawesome-team/capacitor-file-compressor - Capacitor plugin for compressing files.
  • @capawesome-team/capacitor-file-opener - Capacitor plugin to open a file with the default application.
  • @capawesome-team/capacitor-nfc - Capacitor plugin for reading and writing NFC tags.
  • @capawesome-team/capacitor-printer - Capacitor plugin for printing.

entry.title: Awesome Capacitorjs Updates on Dec 04, 2023
entry.content:
Plugins / Community Plugins

  • @capgo/camera-preview (⭐17) - Capacitor plugin that allows camera interaction from HTML code (fork).
  • @capgo/capacitor-crisp (⭐8) - Crisp chat SDK for your app.
  • @capgo/capacitor-flash (⭐15) - Switch the Flashlight / Torch of your device.
  • @capgo/inappbrowser (⭐91) - Browser In app browser with urlChangeEvent.
  • @capgo/capacitor-updater (⭐609) - Live update for capacitor app.
  • @capgo/capacitor-mute (⭐7) - Detect silent mode and mute audio.
  • @capgo/native-audio (⭐47) - Capacitor plugin for native audio engine (fork).
  • @capgo/nativegeocoder (⭐28) - Native forward and reverse geocoding.
  • @capgo/native-market (⭐7) - Capacitor community plugin for native market for Play Store/App Store.
  • @capgo/capacitor-screen-recorder (⭐13) - Record screen and save to pelicule.
  • @revenuecat/purchases-capacitor (⭐192) - Capacitor in-app purchases and subscriptions made easy with RevenueCat.

entry.title: Awesome Capacitorjs Updates on Nov 01, 2023
entry.content:
Plugins / Community Plugins

  • capacitor-plugin-safe-area (⭐106) - Get SafeArea info on Android and IOS.

entry.title: Awesome Capacitorjs Updates on Oct 23, 2023
entry.content:
Plugins / Community Plugins

  • @capacitor-firebase/analytics - Capacitor plugin for Firebase Analytics.
  • @capacitor-firebase/app - Capacitor plugin for Firebase App.
  • @capacitor-firebase/app-check - Capacitor plugin for Firebase App Check.
  • @capacitor-firebase/authentication - Capacitor plugin for Firebase Authentication.
  • @capacitor-firebase/crashlytics - Capacitor plugin for Firebase Crashlytics.
  • @capacitor-firebase/firestore - Capacitor plugin for Firebase Cloud Firestore.
  • @capacitor-firebase/messaging - Capacitor plugin for Firebase Cloud Messaging.
  • @capacitor-firebase/performance - Capacitor plugin for Firebase Performance Monitoring.
  • @capacitor-firebase/remote-config - Capacitor plugin for Firebase Remote Storage.
  • @capacitor-firebase/storage - Capacitor plugin for Firebase Cloud Storage.
  • @capacitor-mlkit/barcode-scanning - Unofficial Capacitor plugin for ML Kit Barcode Scanning.
  • @capacitor-mlkit/face-detection - Unofficial Capacitor plugin for ML Kit Face Detection.
  • @capacitor-mlkit/face-mesh-detection - Unofficial Capacitor plugin for ML Kit Face Mesh Detection.
  • @capacitor-mlkit/selfie-segmentation - Unofficial Capacitor plugin for ML Kit Selfie Segmentation.
  • @capacitor-mlkit/translation - Unofficial Capacitor plugin for ML Kit Translation.
  • @capawesome/capacitor-android-battery-optimization - Capacitor plugin to access battery optimization settings on Android.
  • @capawesome/capacitor-app-update - Capacitor plugin that assists with app updates.
  • @capawesome/capacitor-background-task - Capacitor plugin for running background tasks.
  • @capawesome/capacitor-badge - Capacitor plugin to access and update the badge number of the app icon.
  • @capawesome/capacitor-cloudinary - Unofficial Capacitor plugin for Cloudinary SDK.
  • @capawesome/capacitor-file-picker - Capacitor plugin that allows the user to select a file.
  • @capawesome/capacitor-managed-configurations - Capacitor plugin to access managed configuration settings.
  • @capawesome/capacitor-photo-editor - Capacitor plugin that allows the user to edit a photo.
  • @capawesome/capacitor-screen-orientation - Capacitor plugin to lock/unlock the screen orientation.
  • capacitor-bing-translator (⭐2) - A simple and free API for using Bing Translator.

entry.title: Awesome Capacitorjs Updates on Jul 09, 2023
entry.content:
Plugins / Community Plugins

  • @wahr/capacitor-websocket-client (⭐51) - Capacitor WebSocket Client Plugin.

  • The Push Notifications Guide for Capacitor

entry.title: Awesome Capacitorjs Updates on Nov 19, 2022
entry.content:
Plugins / Community Plugins

  • @cartona/capacitor-google-play-availability (⭐2) - Capacitor plugin to verify that Google Play services is installed and enabled, and request enabling Google Play services on device.

entry.title: Awesome Capacitorjs Updates on Jul 01, 2022
entry.content:
Plugins / Community Plugins

  • send-intent (⭐126) - This is a Capacitor plugin meant to be used in Ionic applications for checking if your App was targeted as a share goal.

entry.title: Awesome Capacitorjs Updates on Oct 16, 2021
entry.content:
Demo Apps / Community Plugins

  • capacitor-firebase-plugin-demo (⭐17) - Simple Ionic Angular app to demonstrate the use of certain Capacitor Firebase plugins.

entry.title: Awesome Capacitorjs Updates on Jul 17, 2021
entry.content:
Official

  • Website
  • Documentation
  • CLI
  • Community
  • Blog
  • Enterprise
  • Repository (⭐14k)
  • Twitter

Guides

  • Creating Plugins
  • Creating Splash Screens and Icons
  • App Deployment and Realtime Updates
  • CI/CD for Capacitor Apps
  • Data Storage in Capacitor
  • Security Best Practices for Capacitor
  • Using Push Notifications with Firebase in an Ionic + Angular App

Learnings

  • Ionic Academy Capacitor Crash Course

Platforms

  • @capacitor/android (⭐14k)
  • @capacitor/ios (⭐14k)
  • @capacitor-community/electron (⭐371)

Plugins

  • Proposals (⭐78)

Plugins / Official Plugins

  • @capacitor/action-sheet - Provides access to native Action Sheets.
  • @capacitor/app - The App API handles high level App state and events.
  • @capacitor/app-launcher - The AppLauncher API allows your app to open other apps.
  • @capacitor/browser - The Browser API provides the ability to open an in-app browser and subscribe to browser events.
  • @capacitor/clipboard - The Clipboard API enables copy and pasting to/from the system clipboard.
  • @capacitor/device - The Device API exposes internal information about the device.
  • @capacitor/dialog - The Dialog API provides methods for triggering native dialog windows for alerts, confirmations, and input prompts.
  • @capacitor/filesystem - The Filesystem API provides a NodeJS-like API for working with files on the device.
  • @capacitor/geolocation - The Geolocation API provides simple methods for getting and tracking the current position of the device using GPS.
  • @capacitor/haptics - The Haptics API provides physical feedback to the user through touch or vibration.
  • @capacitor/keyboard - The Keyboard API provides keyboard display and visibility control, along with event tracking when the keyboard shows and hides.
  • @capacitor/local-notifications - The Local Notifications API provides a way to schedule device notifications locally.
  • @capacitor/motion - The Motion API tracks accelerometer and device orientation.
  • @capacitor/network - The Network API provides network and connectivity information.
  • @capacitor/push-notifications - The Push Notifications API provides access to native push notifications.
  • @capacitor/screen-reader - The Screen Reader API provides access to TalkBack/VoiceOver/etc.
  • @capacitor/share - The Share API provides methods for sharing content in any sharing-enabled apps the user may have installed.
  • @capacitor/splash-screen - The Splash Screen API provides methods for showing or hiding a Splash image.
  • @capacitor/status-bar - The StatusBar API Provides methods for configuring the style of the Status Bar, along with showing or hiding it.
  • @capacitor/storage - The Storage API provides a simple key/value persistent store for lightweight data.
  • @capacitor/text-zoom - The Text Zoom API provides the ability to change Web View text size for visual accessibility.
  • @capacitor/toast - The Toast API provides a notification pop up for displaying important information to a user.

Plugins / Community Plugins

  • @capacitor-community/vue-cli-plugin-capacitor (⭐133) - A Vue CLI 3/4 Plugin for Capacitor.
  • @capacitor-community/twitter (⭐11) - Capacitor plugin to enable TwitterKit.
  • @capacitor-community/fcm (⭐258) - Enable Firebase Cloud Messaging for Capacitor apps.
  • @capacitor-community/intercom (⭐66) - Enable Intercom for Capacitor apps.
  • @capacitor-community/media (⭐125) - Capacitor plugin to activate extra media features.
  • @capacitor-community/firebase-analytics (⭐168) - Enable Firebase Analytics for Capacitor Apps.
  • @capacitor-community/camera-preview (⭐207) - Capacitor plugin that allows camera interaction from HTML code.
  • @capacitor-community/date-picker (⭐92) - Native DateTime Picker Plugin for Capacitor Apps.
  • @capacitor-community/firebase-crashlytics (⭐74) - Capacitor plugin for Firebase Crashlytics.
  • @capacitor-community/sqlite (⭐579) - Community plugin for native & electron SQLite databases.
  • @capacitor-community/stripe (⭐213) - Stripe Mobile SDK wrapper for Capacitor.
  • @capacitor-community/react-hooks (⭐258) - React hooks for Capacitor.
  • @capacitor-community/keep-awake (⭐156) - Capacitor plugin to prevent devices from dimming or locking the screen.
  • @capacitor-community/http (⭐211) - Community plugin for native HTTP.
  • @capacitor-community/text-to-speech (⭐112) - Capacitor plugin for synthesizing speech from text.
  • @capacitor-community/native-audio (⭐137) - Capacitor community plugin for playing sounds.
  • @capacitor-community/firebase-remote-config (⭐23) - Capacitory community plugin for Firebase Remote Config.
  • @capacitor-community/in-app-purchases - WIP: In App Purchases plugin for Capacitor.
  • @capacitor-community/native-market (⭐30) - Capacitor community plugin for native market for Play Store/App Store.
  • @capacitor-community/capacitor-googlemaps-native (⭐157) - Capacitor Plugin using native Google Maps SDK for Android and iOS.
  • @capacitor-community/contacts (⭐139) - Contacts Plugin for Capacitor.
  • @capacitor-community/apple-sign-in (⭐157) - Sign in with Apple Support.
  • @capacitor-community/flipper (⭐12) - Capacitory community plugin for Flipper.
  • @capacitor-community/facebook-login (⭐110) - Facebook Login support.
  • @capacitor-community/admob (⭐247) - Community plugin for using Google AdMob.
  • @capacitor-community/speech-recognition (⭐109) - Capacitor community plugin for speech recognition.
  • @capacitor-community/realm (⭐26) - Capacitor community plugin for native Realm.
  • @capacitor-community/auth0 (⭐9) - A native plugin for Auth0 authentication provider.
  • @capacitor-community/barcode-scanner (⭐443) - A fast and efficient (QR) barcode scanner for Capacitor.
  • @capacitor-community/background-geolocation (⭐219) - Capacitor plugin which lets you receive geolocation updates even while the app is backgrounded.
  • @capacitor-community/bluetooth-le (⭐325) - Capacitor plugin for Bluetooth Low Energy.
  • @capacitor-community/uxcam (⭐5) - UXCam and FullStory app analytics.
  • @capacitor-community/privacy-screen (⭐93) - Capacitor plugin that protects your app from displaying a screenshot in Recents screen/App Switcher.
  • @capacitor-community/screen-brightness (⭐28) - Capacitor community plugin for controlling screen brightness on iOS and Android devices.
  • @capacitor-community/app-icon (⭐90) - Capacitor plugin for managing an iOS app's icon.
  • @capacitor-community/card-scanner (⭐13) - Simple card scanner for Capacitor Applications.
  • @capacitor-community/safe-area (⭐118) - A plugin to expose the safe area insets from the native iOS/Android device to your web project.
  • @capacitor-community/appcenter-sdk-capacitor (⭐35) - Capacitor Plugin for Microsoft's Visual Studio App Center SDK.
  • @capacitor-community/photoviewer (⭐64) - PhotoViewer table images with fullscreen and sharing capabilities.
  • @codetrix-studio/capacitor-google-auth (⭐309) - Capacitor plugin for Google Auth.
  • @teamhive/capacitor-video-recorder (⭐60) - Video recorder plugin for Capacitor.
  • capacitor-data-storage-sqlite (⭐88) - Capacitor Data Storage SQlite Plugin.
  • capacitor-firebase-auth (⭐263) - Capacitor Firebase Authentication Plugin.
  • capacitor-video-player (⭐122) - Capacitor Video Player Plugin.

Demo Apps / Community Plugins

  • capacitor-plugin-demo (⭐113) - Simple Ionic Angular app to demonstrate the use of certain Capacitor plugins.
  • capacitor-testapp (⭐38) - The Capacitor TestApp is used to develop new features and verify bug fixes in Capacitor and the official plugins.

Tools / Community Plugins

  • @capacitor/docgen (⭐13) - Docs Readme Markdown and JSON Generator for Capacitor Plugins.
  • @capacitor/plugin (⭐104) - Create a new Capacitor plugin.
  • cordova-res (⭐552) - Local Cordova icon/splash screen resource generation tool.

Related Lists / Community Plugins

  • Alexintosh/Awesome-Ionic (⭐1.5k)
  • candelibas/awesome-ionic (⭐857)
